name: The Scent Remained
title: Xingqiu: The Scent Remained
desc: His penmanship leaves quite the impression.
in_play_description: When your Xingqiu has this card equipped, the Rain Sword created can block DMG of at least 2 and its starting Usage(s) +1.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Xingqiu to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is Xingqiu, equip this card.
After Xingqiu equips this card, immediately use Fatal Rainscreen once.
When your Xingqiu has this card equipped, the Rain Sword created can block DMG of at least 2 and its starting Usage(s) +1.
(You must have Xingqiu in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
